home.desc: Established in 2021, Eber Group oversees four top-performing chemical manufacturing companies operating across Indonesia.
home.specialty_section_desc: Established in 2021, EBER Group oversees four top-performing chemical manufacturing companies operating across Indonesia, bringing together decades of expertise and innovation in the petrochemical industry.

1.title: Advanced Materials
1.desc: Specializing in high-performance chemical manufacturing and processing.

2.title: Innovation Focus
2.desc: Focused on sustainable chemical production and innovation.

3.title: Sustainability
3.desc: Specialized in solvent production and chemical solutions.

4.title: Expert Team
4.desc: Leading producer of petrochemical products and solutions.

home.custom_product_section_desc: Eber Group's expertise in specialty materials is supported by a strong in-house R&D team, which enables the company to provide solutions for products and processes improvement in the infrastructure, construction, automotive, environmental and manufacturing industries.
home.subsidiaries_section_desc: As an integrated chemical group, EBER Group oversees four leading manufacturing companies strategically located across Indonesia. Each subsidiary has its own specialization, collectively strengthening EBER Group’s position as a key player in the national petrochemical industry.

1.title: PT Eternal Buana Chemical Industries
1.desc: based in Cikupa, Banten, is a major producer of resins and specialty chemicals with a production capacity of 70,000 mtpa. Its product portfolio includes paper chemicals, alkyd acrylic amino resins, unsaturated polyester resins, and synthetic latex resins.

2.title: PT Eterindo Nusa Graha
2.desc: located in Gresik, East Java, operates with a capacity of 51,000 mtpa. The company focuses on plasticizers, resins, and specialty chemicals, serving a wide range of industries from paper and automotive to synthetic materials.

3.title: PT Petrowidada
3.desc: situated in Gresik, is a leading domestic producer of phthalic anhydride with a capacity of 70,000 mtpa. Its products are widely applied in resin and plastic manufacturing, supporting essential downstream industries.

4.title: PT Mega Prima Solvindo
4.desc: headquartered in Cilegon, Banten, specializes in the production of n-Butyl Acetate with a capacity of 20,000 mtpa. This chemical is extensively used in coatings, paints, and adhesive industries.

home.innovation_section_desc: At Eber Group, we’re committed to pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in the petrochemical industry. Our state-of-the-art research facilities and dedicated team of scientists and engineers work tirelessly to develop innovative solutions that address the evolving needs of our customers and the global market.

1.title: Research & Development
1.desc: Continuous investment in R&D to develop cutting-edge chemical solutions and materials.

2.title: Digital Transformation
2.desc: Leveraging advanced technologies to optimize our manufacturing processes and operations.

3.title: Sustainable Solutions
3.desc: Developing eco-friendly products and processes to minimize environmental impact.

4.title: Collaborative Innovation
4.desc: Partnering with industry leaders and research institutions to drive breakthrough innovations.

about_us.desc: Eber Group was incorporated in 2021 as a holding company of four leading high-performance chemical manufacturing companies in Indonesia.
about_us.certification_section_desc: Eber Group oversees four top-performing chemical manufacturing companies operating across Indonesia
about_us.vision_desc: To be the foremost regional petrochemical company for its performance, ESG, people, partnership and business sustainability.
about_us.mission_desc: To develop and produce superior, reliable, environmental friendly product and provide the best solution for our customers and society in building a national industry advancement by making the best use of available resources and embracing a core set of company values.
about_us.corporate_section_desc: At Eber Group, we are committed to maintaining the highest standards of corporate governance, ensuring transparency, accountability, and ethical business practices across all our operations.

1.title: Transparency
1.desc: We maintain open communication with stakeholders and provide clear, accurate information about our operations & performance.

2.title: Accountability
2.desc: Our leadership team takes responsibility for decisions and actions, with clear reporting structures and performance metrics.

3.title: Ethical Practices
3.desc: We adhere to the highest ethical standards in all business dealings, with a comprehensive code of conduct guiding our actions.
